text: Ba kakatletseng Terone le bohle ba e pota-potileng, ba pheta Lithoriso le Tlotla tsa Mong`a bona: ba kholoa ho Eena, ba kopela ba-kholoang ts’oarelo: “Mong`a rona! Ke Uena Ea etselitseng lintho tsohle lesakana-la-nkope ka Mohau le Tsebo, kahoo ts’oarela bohle ba sokolohang, ba latela tsela ea Hau. Ak’u ba qobise Kahlolo ea Lihele
